Class ActionRecordingPlugin

  • java.lang.Object

extends org.elasticsearch.plugins.Plugin
    Plugin that registers a filter that records actions.

      • allRequests

        public static java.util.List<org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<?>> allRequests()
        Fetch all the requests recorded by the test plugin. The list is an immutable, moment in time snapshot.

      • requestsOfType

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> requestsOfType(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Fetch all requests recorded by the test plugin of a certain type. The list is an immutable, moment in time snapshot.

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clear all the recorded requests. Use between test methods that shared a suite scoped cluster.
